ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ispickval(UserType, 'Standard'), Not( REGEX( EmployeeNumber , "[EHT]{1}[0-9]{6}" ) ), not( REGEX( EmployeeNumber , "[U]{1}[0-9]{5}" ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( EmployeeNumber ) ), NOT( CONTAINS( EmployeeNumber , "Duplicate" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Employee Number should be either upper case E, H or T followed by 6 numbers or upper case U followed by 5 numbers.
